title: Move 'Work Order' option under 'Verify Application' section in Work Orders page

requirements.text: In the Work Orders page (frontend/src/pages/WorkOrders.tsx), move the 'Work Order' navigation or tab option so that it appears under the 'Verify Application' section instead of being grouped under the 'Verify' section. Ensure the UI reflects this hierarchy clearly and the option functions correctly in its new location.

quotes: work order option in verify application not verify

acceptanceCriteria: The 'Work Order' option is no longer displayed under the 'Verify' section/tab/group.
The 'Work Order' option is now visible and accessible under the 'Verify Application' section/tab/group.
Clicking the 'Work Order' option under 'Verify Application' correctly navigates to or displays the work order content.
All other sections and options remain unaffected.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Changing backend logic or data models.
Modifying any other page or component outside of WorkOrders.tsx.
Adding new work order features or changing existing work order functionality.
